level.text: Unless the organic rules establish investor members' interests, a member's interest shall be a patron member's interest.
Unless the organic rules otherwise provide, if a limited cooperative association has investor members, while a person is a member of the association, the person, if admitted as:
A patron member, shall remain a patron member;
An investor member, shall remain an investor member; and
A patron member and investor member, shall remain a patron and investor member if not dissociated in one of the capacities.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 602 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act . See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
